name: Motorola Solutions, Inc.
goal: Motorola Solutions is a leading global provider of mission-critical communications. Our technology platforms in communications, software, video, and services make cities safer and help communities and businesses thrive. Public safety and commercial customers depend on our solutions to keep them connected, from everyday to extreme moments. We serve more than 100,000 customers in more than 100 countries.
interests: Borders and Security, Communication, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, Foreign affairs and security policy, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: EU initiatives, policies and legislative files concerning ICT matters, including privacy and data protection, cyber security, Spectrum issues, and digital services taxation.
